text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy I don't believe Fauci anymore he is Obama holdover, testing corona viruses!  He said 3 years ago this would happen!
More people die each year from the flu with a vaccine present!
Covid-19 conspiracy, fear mongering!
PLEASE PRES. TRUMP
DON'T COW DOWN TO THESE REDUCE THE POPULATION
